Package gui

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AssetCreator
    Allows the user to create and save custom species, toyTypes, and foodTypes.
    FoodInventory
    A panel of food icons to display food that is in the player's inventory.
    FoodInventoryIcon
    An icon to represent the number of a specific FoodType in the player's inventory.
    Game
    The main game panel.
    GameSetup
    Allows the user to set up a new game, choosing players, pets, and vital game statistics such as number of days.
    GuiRunner
    A controller and viewer for the application.
    HelpPanel
    A panel that displays information explaining the game mechanics and controls.
    InternalDialog
    An internal dialog box that allows the instantiator to add action listeners to its buttons and choose which buttons to show.
    MainMenu
    A panel that takes up the entire screen, showing a main menu.
    PetInteract
    Displays pet statistics and allows the player to interact with the pet.
    PetSetup
    Allows the user to set the name and species of a single pet, and generate the pet.
    PetStatDisplayer
    A view only slider that displays information about a pet's attribute.
    PetTab
    A clickable tab which will switch the selected pet to the pet represented in this tab, the tab also displays status effects and action points of the pet.
    PlayerSetup
    Allows the user to set up a player, giving it a name and pets.
    RoundOverview
    Displays statistics about the player's scores at the end of each round.
    SaveGameHandler
    A class with purely static methods for the purposes of reading and writing saved game files.
    ShopFoodDisplayer
    A panel for displaying a single food item in the shop.
    ShopPanel
    A panel that displays the shop.
    ShopToyDisplayer
    A panel for displaying a single toy in the shop.
    SpeciesDisplayer
    A box that displays all information about a certain species.
    ToyInventory
    A panel of toy icons to display toys that are in the player's inventory.
    ToyInventoryIcon
    An icon to represent a toy in the player's inventory.
